result.execSummary:
The defendant James M. RISKE Jr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting/Failing to Stop/Fleeing, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(2t).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. James M. RISKE Jr.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Judgment of Conviction Sentence to Jail.  Duplicate original delivered to Sheriff.

State moves to amend Count 2 from felony fleeing an officer to misdemeanor fleeing an officer, contrary to Section 346.04(2t) of the Wisconsin Statutes.  Motion granted.  Guilty plea to the amended charge.  Convicted.  State moves to dismiss and read in count 1, 2nd degree recklessly endangering safety.  Motion granted.  Defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for ninety (90) days, under the Huber Law, to commence on 06-30-14 by 6:00 p.m.  
$443.00 court costs imposed, to be paid from cash bail.
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights. 
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  
$443.00 of cash bail applied to court costs.
$2,057.00 balance of cash bail returned to Kaye Holschbach by check instruction No. CR 88.
Minutes
Plea date set for 06-19-14 at 8:30 a.m.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 06-17-14 at 9:30 a.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 05-21-14 at 2:45 p.m.  
Minutes.
At 3:22 p.m., $2,500.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of fleeing an officer.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 05-12-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $2,500.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and that he not operate any motorcycle.   Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
